paths.name: scale-flight2015
paths.title: Handling the Twitter Scale
paths.description: Learn about keeping track of metrics for microservices architecture, auctions for mobile ads, geotagging for tweets, and more.

pages.preface: We'll cover some of the challenges associated with processing 1.5+ billion metrics every minute to provide visibility into Twitter’s distributed microservices architecture.

MoPub Marketplace handles billions of real-time auctions daily amongst more than 180 bidding platforms. We’ll discuss how the exchange works, how exchanges maximize developer revenue, and take a look at the technologies which make this scale possible.

This module will offer an operations perspective on the management of a Mesos+Aurora cluster, and cover many of the cluster management best practices that have evolved at Twitter from real-world production experience.

Learn about retrieving tweets from the Twitter Streaming API, despeckling, debanding, and de-duplicating the data to reduce distracting artifacts, generating vector map tiles with Tippecanoe, and styling the map with Mapbox Studio, along with some highlights of the resulting map.
